articles.author: Ellen Francis, Sammy Westfall
articles.title: Europe, sidelined by U.S. and Russia, seeks influence in Ukraine talks - The Washington Post
articles.description: European leaders planned to meet Monday on how they might influence talks that could determine the future of Ukraine and of Europe’s security landscape.
articles.content: MUNICH As the Trump administration moves toward direct talks with Russian officials over the war in Ukraine, French President Emmanuel Macron has called European leaders to an emergency meeting to di… [+4677 chars]
